# WKNavigationType.backForward

**Case**

A request for the frame’s next or previous item.

## Declaration

```swift
case backForward
```

## Discussion

This type of action occurs when the navigation originates from an item in a [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKBackForwardList] object.

## Getting the Navigation Types

- **WKNavigationType.linkActivated**: A link activation.
- **WKNavigationType.formSubmitted**: A request to submit a form.
- **WKNavigationType.reload**: A request to reload the webpage.
- **WKNavigationType.formResubmitted**: A request to resubmit a form.
- **WKNavigationType.other**: A navigation request that originates for some other reason.
